Class State

java.lang.Object
  mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.State
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class State
extends Object
implements Serializable

A collection of Fields in an Entity, and its cached copies at clients.

getField

public final Serializable getField(String name)
                            throws NoSuchFieldException
Return the value of a Field in this State. The Field must exist. It is an error to ask for a Field that is not in this State.

Parameters:
name - the field name
Returns:
the value of the field name

NoSuchFieldException

attachFieldListener

public final void attachFieldListener(Set fnames,
                                      FieldListener fl)
Attach a listener to a set of Fields. Ignores members of fnames that are not names of Fields in this State.

Parameters:
fnames - the names of fields
fl - the listener

detachFieldListener

public final void detachFieldListener(Set fnames,
                                      FieldListener fl)
Detach a listener from a set of Fields. Ignores members of fnames that are not names of Fields in this State.

Parameters:
fnames - the names of fields
fl - the listener

public final Set getFieldNames()

a Set of Strings

makeMessage

Build a State.ChangeMessage for changed fields

Parameters:

Returns:
a message encoding the changes to fields named within fnames.

applyMessage

Apply a State.ChangeMessage to this State

Returns:
